ValidationRule.errorConditionFormula: AND( $RecordType.Name='Supplier', ISCHANGED( Account_Status__c ), ISPICKVAL(Account_Status__c,'Active Outreach'), OR( ISBLANK( BillingCity ), ISBLANK( BillingStreet ), ISBLANK( BillingPostalCode ), ISBLANK( BillingCountry ) ), NOT($Permission.Market_Intelligence), NOT( $Permission.Override_Validation ) )
ValidationRule.errorMessage: Please fill the complete address to move to Active Outreach.
